Communicator 4 73 Released Security Flaw In 4 72

16 May 2000

As unexciting as update releases of Netscape 4.x are, a serious security bug with versions 4.72 and earlier might make the effort to download 4.73 worthwhile.\n \n

\n

To read about the security flaw in Communicator 4.72-:\nhttp://news.cnet.com/news/0-1005-200-1888141.html?tag=st.ne.1430735..ni

\n

To download Communicator 4.73:\nhttp://www.netscape.com/computing/download/index.html
